ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lsslss.x | |- X = ( W |`s U ) |
| 2 |  | lsslss.s | |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` W ) = ( Base ` W ) |
| 4 | 1, 3, 2 | #P_islss3 | |- ( W e. LMod -> ( U e. S <-> ( U C_ ( Base ` W ) /\ X e. LMod ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simplbda | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S ) -> X e. LMod ) |
